name: SourceBans
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: SourceBans is a free global administration and banning system for Source engine based servers.

matches.regexp:
(?-mix: <\/a>\n
Version ([\d\.]+) <\/div>)

(?-mix:<div class='dbg' id='[0-9a-f]{7}'><span style='font-weight:bold'>Table '[a-z]+\.sb_settings' doesn't exist<\/span> <br \/><br \/><span>SQL Query type: <\/span><span style='font-weight:bold'>EXECUTE<\/span><span><br \/><span>)
